name: Bo bo bo bo bhoot
description:
Install instructions

i cant export the apk so use this to download it

you need max2d game engine(you can download it from play store its like 20+MB)

step 2 download zarchiver 

step 3 go to android the data(give access to data folder)

find a folder name that starts with mikeytronix

go to mobilegameengine

projects then copy and paste the Zip you downloaded 

then tap on it then extract here 

open max2d game engine you will see a project named YOYO BALL PLATFORMER

tap on it you can mod the game if you want in the game engine tap on play icon on top 

Last step enjoy
